string-array.name: introscreen_summaries
string-array.item: You need to have a rooted Android device to use this app.
… and configure the process with notifications, vibrations etc.
Some JSON files can be used to store the configuration of the click process.
The standalone mode can start the click process using only the JSON configuration files.
The standalone mode can also start the click process according to a picture of the screen.
Smooth Clicker is both free and open-source!

string-array.name: standalone_mode_descriptions
string-array.item: Use the two JSON files to set tup the click process
Use the two JSON files and the screen capture to set up and start the click process

string-array.name: standalone_mode_titles
string-array.item: JSON files and boot according to the screen

Did you root your Android before using this app? It is mandatory.
Click on the screen to select the point, then back

Save the configuration and starts the procesus

AppIntro is a library for making a cool intro in your Android apps.

The click process is running (through the app)…
The click process is running (through the service)…

The app needs this permission to read configuration files in a dedicated folder
The app needs this permission to write configuration files in a dedicated folder

Picture file which starts the click process

This app uses third party contents
When the screen is off, turn it on if the device uses its battery and not the power supply
Go to Chainfire to get more knowledge about root process
Go to Heimdall to root your device with Linux
Go to Odin to root your device with Windows
Use a dedicated custom script having system commands to unlock the device
Use wakelocks to make the device always screen on (can reduce a lot the battery)
Feel free to rate and comment the app
The higher is the time for the capture, the slower will be the system to take screen shots of the device to trigger the click process
The more the threshold is, the more accepted are the differences between the trigger picture and the last screen-shot made
Shake your device to make the configuration empty
Woops …, you did not use a good action to trigger this activity!

Are you sure to make an endless repeat? This operation may be hazardous for your device.
